DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find a safe and effective dose of Erbitux and Iressa for subject with non small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study of Cetuximab in Combination With Gefitinib in Patients With Advanced/Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Subjects with advanced or metastatic non small cell lung cancer. Subjects should have had at least one prior chemotherapy with a platinum based therapy. Subjects are excluded from this study if they do not have non small cell lung cancer that is advanced or metastatic or have not had at least one prior platinum based chemotherapy.
